author: Ben

categories.description: Parse, validate, stringify, and minify JSON data
categories.name: JSON Processing

categories.description: Convert between JSON, XML, CSV, and YAML formats
categories.name: Format Conversion

categories.description: Advanced JSON operations including path extraction and schema validation
categories.name: Advanced JSON

categories.description: Helper functions for module management and configuration
categories.name: Utility

changes: Complete data format processing suite implementation
JSON parsing, validation, and manipulation with error handling
XML parsing and bidirectional JSON/XML conversion
CSV to JSON conversion with automatic type detection
YAML to JSON bidirectional conversion with type preservation
JSON path extraction using dot notation
Enhanced error handling for all operations

description: Comprehensive data format conversion and processing module written in Go and compiled to WebAssembly. Features JSON, XML, CSV, and YAML parsing, validation, and transformation capabilities. Optimized for GoWM integration.

errorHandling.description: Data processing module returns objects with 'error' field when operations fail
errorHandling.detection: if (result.error) { /* handle error */ } else { /* use result data */ }

examples.cause: Called parseJSON() with malformed JSON string
examples.error: Invalid JSON: unexpected character 'a' at position 5

examples.cause: Called parseXML() with malformed XML structure
examples.error: Invalid XML: element is not closed

examples.cause: Called csvToJSON() with inconsistent CSV structure
examples.error: Invalid CSV: record has wrong number of fields

examples.cause: Called yamlToJSON() with invalid YAML syntax
examples.error: Invalid YAML: mapping values are not allowed here

examples.cause: Called validateJSONSchema() with data that doesn't match schema
examples.error: Schema validation failed: required property missing

examples.title: GoWM Integration - Basic JSON Processing
XML/JSON Bidirectional Conversion
CSV Processing and Conversion
YAML Configuration Processing
Error Handling Patterns and Data Validation
React Data Converter Component

functions.description: Parse and validate JSON string into structured data
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on parse failure
functions.name: parseJSON

parameters.description: JSON string to parse and validate
parameters.name: jsonString

functions.description: Convert JavaScript object to JSON string with optional formatting
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on stringify failure
functions.name: stringifyJSON

parameters.description: Data to convert to JSON string
parameters.name: data

parameters.description: Optional: enable pretty printing with indentation
parameters.name: pretty

functions.errorPattern: Returns validation result with errors array if invalid
functions.name: validateJSON

functions.description: Remove whitespace and minimize JSON string size
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if input is invalid JSON
functions.name: minifyJSON

functions.description: Parse and validate XML string into structured data
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field on parse failure
functions.name: parseXML

parameters.description: XML string to parse and validate
parameters.name: xmlString

functions.errorPattern: Returns validation result with errors array if invalid
functions.name: validateXML

functions.description: Convert XML string to JSON format with structured mapping
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if XML is invalid
functions.name: xmlToJSON

parameters.description: XML string to convert to JSON
parameters.name: xmlString

functions.description: Convert JSON string to XML format with configurable root element
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if JSON is invalid
functions.name: jsonToXML

parameters.description: JSON string to convert to XML
parameters.name: jsonString

functions.description: Convert CSV data to JSON array with header-based field mapping
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if CSV is malformed
functions.name: csvToJSON

parameters.description: CSV string with headers in first row
parameters.name: csvString

functions.description: Convert JSON array to CSV format with automatic header generation
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if JSON is not a valid array
functions.name: jsonToCSV

parameters.description: JSON array string to convert to CSV
parameters.name: jsonString

functions.description: Convert YAML string to JSON format with type preservation
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if YAML is invalid
functions.name: yamlToJSON

parameters.description: YAML string to convert to JSON
parameters.name: yamlString

functions.description: Convert JSON string to YAML format with proper indentation
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if JSON is invalid
functions.name: jsonToYAML

parameters.description: JSON string to convert to YAML
parameters.name: jsonString

functions.description: Extract specific values from JSON using dot notation path
functions.errorPattern: Returns object with 'error' field if JSON is invalid or path not found
functions.name: extractJSONPath

functions.description: Validate JSON data against a JSON schema with basic validation rules
functions.errorPattern: Returns validation result with detailed error messages
functions.name: validateJSONSchema

functions.description: Get list of all available functions in the module
functions.example:
const functions = jsonxml.call('getAvailableFunctions');
console.log('Available functions:', functions);
functions.name: getAvailableFunctions

functions.description: Enable or disable console logging for operations
functions.example:
const currentMode = jsonxml.call('setSilentMode', true);
console.log('Silent mode enabled:', currentMode);
functions.name: setSilentMode

parameters.description: Optional: true to disable logging, false to enable (default: false)
parameters.name: silent

name: jsonxml-wasm

limitations: Memory usage scales with document size
Complex XML namespaces have basic support
JSON schema validation is simplified (not full JSON Schema spec)
optimizations: Streaming XML parsing for large documents
Efficient memory management with Go GC

features: Input validation for all data formats
Protection against XXE (XML External Entity) attacks
Safe JSON parsing with recursion limits
No external dependencies for core parsing

usage.calling: Use jsonxml.call('functionName', ...args) or call functions directly
usage.errorHandling: Check result.error field for error messages in function responses
usage.initialization: Load the WASM module and wait for __gowm_ready signal
